fields.name: ContentMatch
fields.description: Content to look for in the return of the WebTest.  Must not be null or empty.

fields.name: IgnoreCase
fields.description: When set, this value makes the ContentMatch validation case insensitive.

fields.name: PassIfTextFound
fields.description: When true, validation will pass if there is a match for the ContentMatch string.  If false, validation will fail if there is a match
